structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
URBAN SERVICES DISTRICTS -- AMBULANCE SERVICE DISTRICTS

law.text: A civil service system for employees of the district may be established by the council in accordance with the plan outlined for cities of the first class or a consolidated local government under KRS 90.110 to 90.230.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 159, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 8, effective June 16, 1960.
